import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html' }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} goTo(path: string) { this.router.navigate([path]); } }

Welcome to Our Accessible Website

Key Features

Accessible Navigation

Fully keyboard-accessible navigation with ARIA labels and skip links.

Semantic HTML

Properly structured content using semantic HTML elements.
